article:
My name is Bob. I'm a middle school student. My home is about two miles _ school. I usually leave _ school at about 6: 30. I usually get to school on foot . It takes me about 20 minutes. But sometimes I go there by bike . It takes _ only ten minutes.
My friend Nick, usually goes to school by bus. He usually gets up at 5: 30 every day. Then he has _ quick breakfast and goes to school at six. First he walks to the bus stop. Then the bus takes _ to school. It usually takes him forty minutes to get to school. There are different ways to get to school. But I like walking best.
